about_the_game:
This is a light version of TWTP without the Steam features, which may have a better performance on PCs.
The game is exanctly same, and it also supports English, Simplied Chinese and Thai.

This version doesn't run on Steam.
After installed, the game will be downloaded in your local folder.
Check your game library, right click "The Witches' Tea Party", click "properties" and find the "local files".
Unzip and click Tea Party Light.exe to play.

If you have any v2.0 savedata, copy them to www/save to keep playing.

This version doesn't support Steam achievements.
